name: Control Sphere
description:
Control Sphere lets you explore a new kind of gesture based interface in Virtual Reality.

With the sphere in your hands you combine particles and colors to light up the night sky! The flexible system is based on one simple gesture for each finger, triggering different actions depending on positioning and rotation of the hands. The visual design aims to be easy to understand and satisfying to use while having a large number of possible particle/color combinations.

Demonstration Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HGrG4UrabJ8
